Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.adapter

Distance functions deriving distances from e.g. similarity measures

See:
          Description


Class Summary
AbstractSimilarityAdapter<O> Adapter from a normalized similarity function to a distance function.
AbstractSimilarityAdapter.Instance<O> Inner proxy class for SNN distance function.
AbstractSimilarityAdapter.Parameterizer<O> Parameterization class.
SimilarityAdapterArccos<O> Adapter from a normalized similarity function to a distance function using arccos(sim).
SimilarityAdapterArccos.Instance<O> Distance function instance
SimilarityAdapterArccos.Parameterizer<O> Parameterization class.
SimilarityAdapterLinear<O> Adapter from a normalized similarity function to a distance function using 1 - sim.
SimilarityAdapterLinear.Instance<O> Distance function instance
SimilarityAdapterLinear.Parameterizer<O> Parameterization class.
SimilarityAdapterLn<O> Adapter from a normalized similarity function to a distance function using -log(sim).
SimilarityAdapterLn.Instance<O> Distance function instance
SimilarityAdapterLn.Parameterizer<O> Parameterization class.
